## Text Outline
This text covers the basics of:

1. Exploring data

3. Two-sample tests
4. **ANOVA and linear regression**

## Part Outline
This part of the text contains the chapters on various ways to perform ANOVA and linear regression: 

- One-Way ANOVA
- Two-way ANOVA
- Welch's ANOVA
- Kruskal-Wallace Test
- Tukey HSD Post-Hoc Test
- Repeated Measures ANOVA
- Random Intercept Models
- Correlation Matrices and Covariances
- Multiple Regression (linear)
